bibdata.title: IEEE Standard Glossary of Computer Applications Terminology
IEEE Standard Glossary of Computer Applications Terminology

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This glossary defines terms in the field of computer applications. Topics covered include automated language processing, automatic indexing, business data processing, character recognition, computer-aided design and manufacturing, computer-assisted instruction, control systems, critical path method, library automation, medical applications, micrographics, office automation, operations research, personal computing, scientific and engineering applications, telecommunication applications, and word processing.<<ETX>>

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
